import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useShoppingCart } from '../context/ShoppingCartContext' import { currencyFormatter } from '../utilities/currencyFormatter' const ProductCard = ({product}) => { const {incrementQuantity} = useShoppingCart() return (
QUICK VIEW

{product.category}

{product.name}

{currencyFormatter(product)}

) } export default ProductCard
